title: Sexy Big Mac
description: Katie and the Union try to come up with a good username for a fan. Christina is a star in the making (11:35), Travis napped this weekend (25:25) & Katie got an odd gift (35:44). What qualifies a no-hitter and new rules for bench clearing brawls (52:25). Don’t hug Roger Goodell (1:06:00). Unleash the Kraken Bar & Lounge (1:18:08). Shots of Jager (1:23:07). Get off Tom Brady’s lawn (1:30:24). A crazy night in the UFC (1:42:23). And, where is home (2:11:35)?
itunes:author: ESPN, Katie Nolan
itunes:subtitle: Katie & the Union chat about brawls, hugs, Jager and more
